'''Electro Sigils''' can be found in [[Inazuma]]. It can be offered to the [[Sacred Sakura]] to increase the [[Sacred Sakura's Favor]] Level to obtain valuable rewards, and increase [[Electrogranum]]'s level. It can also be spent after Version 2.4 at [[Netsuke no Gen Crafts]] once the Sacred Sakura's Favor has reached level 50.

They can be obtained in Inazuma by opening [[Chests]], completing one-time [[Domains]], and from rewards from the [[Statue of The Seven]].
